attributes.action: Allow TV licensing enforcement officers to be armed.
attributes.additional_details: In these current "austerity times", the public try to evade the TV licence. Enforcement officers are sent to offending properties to sell a TV licence to the "Legal Occupier". Recently, enforcement officers have come under an increasing level of abuse and resistance. Please can the government consider arming enforcement officers (aka salesman) with semi-automatic weapons, pepper spray, tear gas and pocket sized nuclear weapons (but nothing too dangerous).
